bug.short_desc: Document how to use rest.Resource with a Dedicated Transport

long_desc.thetext:
There is the possiblity that you can use qx.io.rest.Resource with a dedicated transport [1][4]. This is interesting when you e.g. try to do cross-domain REST.
Unfortunately, the manual doesn't provide instructions on how to achieve that (e.g. subclass rest.Resource, override _getRequest(), ... or similar).
[1] http://qooxdoo.678.n2.nabble.com/REST-CORS-td7461414.html#a7470381 [2] http://manual.qooxdoo.org/3.0/pages/communication/request_io.html#choosing-an-appropriate-transport [3] http://manual.qooxdoo.org/3.0/pages/communication/rest.html [4] http://demo.qooxdoo.org/3.0/apiviewer/#qx.io.rest.Resource
